snippet: The detainees are being interrogated and ordered to denounce the Dalai Lama, according to groups who have conducted interviews with family members.
abstract: Hundreds of Tibetans who attended an important Buddhist ceremony in January in India have been detained without charge by Chinese security officers on their return to Tibet; this is the first time that the Chinese authorities have detained large numbers of Tibetan pilgrims returning from the ceremony, many of whom are elderly and have been detained for more than two months.
lead_paragraph: The detainees are being interrogated and ordered to denounce the Dalai Lama, according to groups who have conducted interviews with family members.
